name: City of Darkness
description:
City of Darkness | Wowie Jam 4.0 entry | "Collaborate with AI"

Be ready to face the horrors you will find in the City of Darkness. Stop the hordes of creatures and demons trying to destroy you with the help of automatized turrets that you can enhance as you get more experience.

Every game session will be completely different. We wish you the best of luck to escape from this nightmare alive...

Game Design and Coding by Néstor García @ BeWolf Studio
Made with Godot: https://godotengine.org/license
Sprites by Retrocade Media, ansimuz, Robocelot, and Elthen's Pixel Art Shop at itch.io; color palette by ENDESGA
Music by White Bat Audio; audio by FreeSound,Audio Alchemist and Big 5 Audio

Thanks for playing!

Controls

Movement: WASD
Point of View: Mouse
Shoot: Left click (continuous)
Use turret upgrades: SPACE
Pause: ESC/ENTER
